segments.text: Hello , this is Catherine . I am calling about the appointment with Mr . Liu for this afternoon . Something has just come up . I am afraid the appointment will have to be rescheduled . I am very sorry about the change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is all right . Maybe we can make another arrangement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are very kind to say so . Thank you . Do you think tomorrow morning would suit him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid there is a bit of a problem . in fact , he has booked up the whole week except tomorrow afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tomorrow afternoon . Um ... When do you think I can come and see him tomorrow afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please let me check ... Tomorrow afternoon ... Yes , he'll be free from 3:00 tomorrow afternoon . Do you think it's convenient for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's quite all right for me . Can we change it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Let's change it . Tomorrow afternoon at three . I am going to schedule it for that time and inform Mr.Liu about the change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . See you tomorrow afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2
